changeSet.author: settler
changeSet.createView: SELECT s.id, s.type, CONCAT(IF(ISNULL(o.first_name), '', CONCAT(o.first_name, ' ')), IF(ISNULL(o.last_name), '', o.last_name)) AS owner, CONCAT(IF(ISNULL(c.first_name), '', CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ')), IF(ISNULL(c.last_name), '', c.last_name)) AS contractor, s.reference, s.balance, s.created, s.start_date, s.end_date, s.evaluated, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mod_comment mc WHERE mc.prv_object = s.id) AS comment_count FROM dev_settler.mod_settlement s LEFT JOIN prv_user o ON s.owner = o.id LEFT JOIN prv_user c ON s.contractor = c.id;

SELECT s.id, s.type, CONCAT(IF(ISNULL(o.first_name), '', CONCAT(o.first_name, ' ')), IF(ISNULL(o.last_name), '', o.last_name)) AS owner, CONCAT(IF(ISNULL(c.first_name), '', CONCAT(c.first_name, ' ')), IF(ISNULL(c.last_name), '', c.last_name)) AS contractor, s.reference, s.value, s.created, s.confirmed, s.evaluated, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM mod_comment mc WHERE mc.prv_object = s.id) AS comment_count FROM dev_settler.mod_transaction s LEFT JOIN prv_user o ON s.owner = o.id LEFT JOIN prv_user c ON s.contractor = c.id;
